title: ABC World News Tonight
descriptor: ABC’s flagship nightly newscast. National and global headlines delivered with clarity and context.

title: CBS Evening News
descriptor: CBS’s nightly broadcast. Balanced coverage of politics, culture, and world events.

title: NBC Nightly News
descriptor: NBC’s evening newscast. Trusted reporting on national and international developments.

title: PBS NewsHour
descriptor: PBS’s in‑depth nightly news program. Long‑form reporting and analysis on politics and civic issues.

title: CNN News Central
descriptor: CNN’s flagship daytime news block. Breaking news and analysis from correspondents worldwide.

title: Fox News Special Report
descriptor: Fox News’ evening political program. Conservative analysis of Washington and global affairs.

title: MSNBC All In with Chris Hayes
descriptor: Progressive nightly program hosted by Chris Hayes. Deep dives into politics, policy, and activism.

title: MSNBC The Rachel Maddow Show
descriptor: Rachel Maddow’s progressive analysis. Investigative reporting and commentary on politics and culture.

title: NewsNation Prime
descriptor: NewsNation’s nightly broadcast. Marketed as unbiased coverage of national and global events.

title: Bloomberg Balance of Power
descriptor: Bloomberg’s daily program on politics and economics. Focused on the intersection of markets and governance.

title: C-SPAN Washington Journal
descriptor: C-SPAN’s morning call-in program. Citizens engage directly with policymakers and journalists on current issues.

title: C-SPAN News Programming
descriptor: Unfiltered coverage of congressional hearings, press conferences, and civic events. A transparency-first approach.

title: BBC World News America
descriptor: BBC’s nightly broadcast tailored for U.S. audiences. Global headlines with international context and analysis.

title: DW News
descriptor: Germany’s international broadcaster. Global news and European perspectives on politics, economics, and culture.

title: Al Jazeera English News
descriptor: Al Jazeera’s English-language news program. Global coverage with a focus on the Middle East and developing world.

title: Sky News Live
descriptor: UK-based nightly news program. International headlines and analysis from Sky’s global correspondents.

title: France 24
descriptor: France 24’s English-language newscast. European and global perspectives on politics, economics, and culture.

title: NHK World Newsline
descriptor: Japan’s international broadcaster. Newsline delivers Asian and global headlines with Japanese perspectives.

title: CTV National News
descriptor: Canada’s nightly national newscast. Coverage of Canadian politics and global events from a Canadian lens.

title: Fox News Hannity
descriptor: Sean Hannity’s primetime conservative program. Commentary and interviews focused on Republican politics and cultural debates.

title: Fox News The Ingraham Angle
descriptor: Laura Ingraham’s nightly conservative show. Strong opinions on politics, culture, and media narratives.

title: Fox News Jesse Watters Primetime
descriptor: Jesse Watters hosts Fox’s primetime program. Conservative commentary on politics, media, and cultural issues.

title: MSNBC The Last Word with Lawrence O’Donnell
descriptor: Lawrence O’Donnell’s progressive nightly program. Commentary and analysis on politics, law, and democracy.

title: MSNBC Deadline: White House
descriptor: Nicolle Wallace hosts progressive analysis of Washington politics. Interviews and commentary on campaigns and governance.

title: CNN Anderson Cooper 360
descriptor: Anderson Cooper’s nightly program. Balanced reporting and interviews on politics, culture, and global events.

title: CNN Erin Burnett OutFront
descriptor: Erin Burnett’s evening show. Breaking news and analysis on politics, business, and international affairs.

title: CNN The Situation Room with Wolf Blitzer
descriptor: Wolf Blitzer’s long‑running CNN program. Coverage of breaking news and Washington politics.

title: CNN The Lead with Jake Tapper
descriptor: Jake Tapper’s afternoon program. Political analysis and reporting on national and global events.

title: CNN State of the Union
descriptor: Sunday morning political program hosted by Dana Bash. Interviews with lawmakers and analysis of policy debates.

title: MSNBC Morning Joe
descriptor: Morning roundtable hosted by Joe Scarborough, Mika Brzezinski, and Willie Geist. Progressive analysis of politics and culture.

title: MSNBC PoliticsNation with Al Sharpton
descriptor: Rev. Al Sharpton’s weekly program. Progressive commentary on civil rights, politics, and social justice.

title: MSNBC The Beat with Ari Melber
descriptor: Ari Melber blends law and politics. Progressive analysis with cultural references and sharp interviews.

title: Fox News America’s Newsroom
descriptor: Midday news program hosted by Dana Perino and Bill Hemmer. Conservative framing of national and global events.

title: Fox News Outnumbered
descriptor: Panel show featuring four women and one man. Conservative commentary on politics and culture.

title: Fox News The Five
descriptor: Roundtable of Fox hosts debating politics and culture. Conservative perspectives with lively discussion.

title: Fox News Gutfeld!
descriptor: Greg Gutfeld’s late‑night conservative comedy show. Satirical takes on politics, media, and culture.

title: CNN Newsroom
descriptor: CNN’s rolling news coverage. Anchors deliver breaking news and analysis throughout the day.

title: CNN Inside Politics
descriptor: CNN’s political analysis program. Reporters and analysts break down Washington’s latest developments.

title: Meet the Press
descriptor: NBC’s long‑running Sunday political program. Interviews with policymakers and analysis of Washington’s biggest debates.

title: Face the Nation
descriptor: CBS’s Sunday morning political show. Conversations with lawmakers and experts on policy and governance.

title: This Week with George Stephanopoulos
descriptor: ABC’s Sunday political program. George Stephanopoulos interviews leaders and analyzes campaigns and policy.

title: Fox News Sunday
descriptor: Fox News’ Sunday morning program. Conservative analysis and interviews with politicians and policymakers.

title: Washington Week
descriptor: PBS’s weekly political roundtable. Journalists discuss the week’s top stories with depth and civility.

title: Full Measure with Sharyl Attkisson
descriptor: Investigative program hosted by Sharyl Attkisson. Conservative‑leaning reporting on government accountability and media bias.

title: Frontline
descriptor: PBS’s investigative documentary series. In‑depth reporting on politics, social issues, and global events.

title: 60 Minutes
descriptor: CBS’s iconic newsmagazine. Long‑form investigative stories and interviews on politics, culture, and global affairs.

title: Dateline NBC
descriptor: NBC’s newsmagazine program. Investigative reporting and true‑crime stories with civic and cultural impact.
ABC’s newsmagazine. Investigative features and cultural reporting on politics, society, and human interest stories.

title: Democracy Now! Daily Show
descriptor: Independent progressive news hour. Daily coverage of activism, global justice, and grassroots movements.

title: Real Time with Bill Maher
descriptor: Bill Maher’s weekly talk show. Progressive commentary mixed with comedy and panel debates on politics and culture.

title: The Daily Show
descriptor: Comedy Central’s satirical news program. Progressive humor and commentary on politics, media, and culture.

title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver
descriptor: John Oliver’s satirical weekly program. Progressive analysis of politics and culture with deep investigative humor.

title: Amanpour & Company
descriptor: Christiane Amanpour hosts global interviews and analysis. Conversations with leaders, thinkers, and journalists worldwide.

title: Nightline
descriptor: ABC’s late‑night news program. In‑depth reporting and interviews on politics, culture, and human interest stories.

title: NewsHour Weekend
descriptor: PBS’s weekend edition of NewsHour. Focused on civic issues, politics, and international reporting.

title: Inside Edition
descriptor: CBS’s newsmagazine program. Human interest stories, investigative reports, and civic culture coverage.

title: The Young Turks (Video Show)
descriptor: Progressive digital video show. Bold commentary on politics, activism, and media accountability.

title: The Rubin Report
descriptor: Dave Rubin hosts libertarian‑leaning interviews. Conversations on free speech, politics, and culture.

title: Breaking Points
descriptor: Independent news show hosted by Krystal Ball and Saagar Enjeti. Balanced populist perspectives from left and right.

title: Secular Talk
descriptor: Kyle Kulinski’s progressive commentary show. Covers politics, media, and activism with a leftist lens.

title: Timcast IRL
descriptor: Tim Pool’s nightly livestream. Conservative‑leaning analysis of politics, media, and culture.

title: The Hill Rising
descriptor: The Hill’s independent morning show. Hosts debate politics and policy from populist left and right perspectives.

title: The Laura Flanders Show
descriptor: Laura Flanders spotlights grassroots movements. Progressive and socialist perspectives on activism, culture, and democracy.

title: The Real News Network
descriptor: Independent progressive video journalism. Covers labor, climate, and social justice issues with activist voices.

title: The Majority Report (Video)
descriptor: Video edition of Sam Seder’s progressive talk show. Commentary and interviews on politics and media.

title: The Glenn Beck Program (Video)
descriptor: Video edition of Glenn Beck’s conservative talk program. Commentary on politics, culture, and faith.

title: Turning Point USA
descriptor: Video edition of Charlie Kirk’s conservative program. Commentary on politics, culture, and grassroots organizing.

title: PragerU Live
descriptor: PragerU’s live video programming. Conservative commentary on culture, economics, and politics.

title: The Young Americans for Liberty Show
descriptor: Libertarian youth movement show. Focused on activism, free markets, and limited government.

title: Reason TV
descriptor: Reason magazine’s video channel. Libertarian analysis of politics, economics, and culture.

title: The Atlantic Live
descriptor: The Atlantic’s live event programming. Conversations with writers, thinkers, and leaders on politics and culture.

title: Brookings Events
descriptor: Brookings Institution’s public events. Policy discussions with scholars and policymakers on pressing civic issues.

title: Heritage Foundation Live
descriptor: Heritage Foundation’s live programming. Conservative policy forums and discussions on law, economics, and culture.

title: Cato Institute Events
descriptor: Cato Institute’s public events. Libertarian analysis of policy, economics, and governance.

descriptor: AEI’s live programming. Conservative scholars discuss economics, foreign policy, and governance.

descriptor: CAP’s public events. Progressive policy forums on economics, healthcare, climate, and democracy reform.

descriptor: CFR’s public events. Global analysis on foreign policy, economics, and international relations.

descriptor: Carnegie Endowment’s public events. Global think tank perspectives on democracy, security, and international affairs.

descriptor: Wilson Center’s public events. Scholars explore international affairs, democracy, and global governance.
